p: Interestingly, interleukin(IL)-6 levels are significantly elevated in severe COVID-19, suggesting its crucial role in cytokine storm and predicting adverse outcomes [ 13, 14]. IL-6 levels are associated with SARS-CoV-2 viral load [ 15]. Blocking IL-6 receptor might be a promising strategy in the disease management. Preliminary evidence from a small uncontrolled trial in China proves that tocilizumab in addition to routine therapy is effective for decreasing C-reactive protein levels and alleviating symptoms. Tocilizumab therapy is listed in the recommendations for severe COVID-19 management by the National Institute for the Infectious Diseases ‘Lazzaro Spallanzani' [ 5].
